item.title: Stone Mason (Level 5)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Author (Level 6)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Butcher (Level 4)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 2)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Miller (Level 3)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 24 times with git add -p.

item.title: Stamp Collector
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog --date=relative

item.title: Weaver
item.description: Investigate old branches by using git reflog

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 1)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Dentist
item.description: Extracted patches using git log -p.

item.title: Apprentice Historian (Level 2)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Delivery Boy (Level 1)
item.description: Move objects and refs by archive with git bundle.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 1)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 1)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.
